title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Skills: Self-Determination Theory-Based Science Capstone Project: Community Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Scientific methodology and foundational domain knowledge, workplace problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Design and execute science projects that fulfill Self-Determination Theory’s three basic needs (autonomy, competence, relatedness)
Complete simulations solving community issues using community-based inquiry methods in blended learning environments with over 90% accuracy
Systematize scientific problem-solving processes into portfolios using VR-based assessment tools and propose improvements incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
